content: I’ve created this blog as a way to help share some of my discoveries. Nothing I write is “The Way” but rather “A Way”.

Welcome #This blog is finally up and I decided to base it on Hugo and Congo as a theme.
Not sure about the (main) language yet but using English is definetly a thing I appreciate with our blogs cause you simply make your things available to more people.
Auf Deutsch wird es aber sicherlich immer wieder etwas geben. 😎
title: Hugo & Congo
